Perceptor:

"she hasnt done anything evil"said Perceptor"she retained mostly of her 
personality and she hadnt changed but memories of all sufering that she had 
endure in that place will be the most likely to haunt her... but if Rodimus 
could overcome that she will do it too"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Wednesday, November 10, 2010 1:30 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The Awakening/nighlight

> <OLD>
>
> "Rodimus wont be very happy if we delete all her memories togehter the
> corrupted programs"hisse Perceptor"it msut exist away to do it... could we
> contain her memories and delete the programs? or insolate one and eraser 
> it
> and then erase the other?"

Legacy looked like he was about to say something when Santon stepped
in smoothly. "Legacy is right." Santon started with with a casual nod
to the larger and more formidable temporal soldier. "But he is also
more linear." Santon said as he looked at Perceptor. "Sometimes too
linear."

Legacy's optic flashed but he remained silent.

"He is right in that memory and personality are interdependent. One
supports the other." Santon pointed to Nightlight, "If we keep her
memories but delete her programming then she will remember that she
loves Rodimus but without a personality structure to back that then
either her files will become corrupt or her personality matrix will
create a reason which may recreate the problem that was there in the
first place."

Santon frowned, "What do you think her personality will do with the
memories of her evil deeds, her desires to do them, how she felt when
she did them?"

Santon paused thoughtfully as Bump turned away from his console and
spoke. "If we are going to do this then we will have to create a
totally new personality profile, one that will take into account her
entire store of memories."

Santon nodded, "Yeah, what if don't delete the personality, since it
is already there, but modify it?" Santon looked at Legacy and then
Perceptor, not sure if what he was saying was really possible.

If it were possible, Legacy looked unsure as well. This was all new
territory for them as well.

(TAG)

Preston
